attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bible is the holy book of Christians and we object to the violation of the holy word of God at the exhibition at the Gallery of Modern Art (Goma) in Glasgow. 

Stop defacing the Bible now. This action is unacceptable.

This is a desecration of our sacred Bible. The United Kingdom was founded on Christian principles and it's time to get back to basics.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
